config.Enable mod?.name: Enable mod?
config.Animal Abundance Level.name: Animal Abundance Level
config.Animal Abundance Level.descriptio: Determines how many animals can appear and whether there should be certain conditions to be met. High: Any animal can show up without requirements and will almost always appear, Low: Animals don't need require any conditions to appear but still have a chance of not showing up on random days, Vanilla: Some animals have certain conditions that need to be met before they start appearing.
config.Allow Bonus Animals.name: Allow Bonus Animals
config.Allow Bonus Animals.description: A collection of random creatures that are added in just for fun . Most (if not all) have a smaller chance of spawning in the random, somewhat hidden places chosen for them.
config.Allow Festive Animals.name: Allow Festive Animals
config.Allow Festive Animals.description: Certain animals have a chance to spawn in certain maps depending on the near festival dates if enabled.
config.Allow Junimo sprite changes.name: Allow Junimo sprite changes
config.Allow Junimo sprite changes.descr: Junimos spawned in the Community Center/in-game cutscenes could use random Junimo sprites provided by this mod if toggled on. Toggled off will keep the junimo sprites unchanged in the community center and cutscenes.
config.Allow WA Junimo sprite changes.de: Toggle on if you want the Junimos spawned by the Wild Animals mod to use a random set of junimo sprites. Toggling it off if you want to keep using your own personal junimo sprites.
config.Give Junimos Leaf Umbrellas.name: Give Junimos Leaf Umbrellas
config.Give Junimos Leaf Umbrellas.descr: Junimos will hold leaf umbrellas when it's raining outside if toggled on.
config.Raccoon Colors.name: Raccoon Colors
config.Raccoon Colors.description: Chooses the color of the raccoons spawned from this mod. 'Vanilla' matches the raccoons in the vanilla game, while 'Original' is the old colors that Wild Animals' raccoons came with.
